```{r}
library(psych)
library(readr)

# Load your combined dataset
combined_df <- read_csv('W:/Fmri_Forschung/Allerlei/JuliaS/GitHub/SubliminalVideoPriming/data/speech/combined_speech_demographic_info.csv')

# Select only the speech features columns for factor analysis
speech_features <- combined_df[, 1:240]  # Adjust the column range as needed

# Perform factor analysis
fa_result <- fa(speech_features, nfactors=5, rotate="varimax")

# Print the factor loadings
print(fa_result$loadings)


```
